metadata.title: Arctic Ocean-Climate Chemistry Data, 1974-1989
metadata.description: Carbon cycle, nutrient and salinity data from several arctic cruises: July and September, 1989 ; 1974 and 1975 to the Beaufort Sea; and in 1977 to the Amundsen Gulf.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Observations of carbon cycling in the arctic.

Supplemental Information: Priority: 3
Priority Justification: Null
Risk Justification: Custodian will be leaving soon and has a large quantity of data not secured in a regional data centre.
Risk of Loss: High
Impact Justification: Data are related to a subject, location or species of concern within the scientific,  government or public community within the last 5 years.
Impact of Loss: Medium
Recommended Action: Obtain access to data, assess data and bring to archives if possible.
Additional Info: Null

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Data not quality checked

Distribution liability: [unknown]

Hardcopy Volume: One thin file
